mapper.select: SELECT a_id, a_name, a_addr, a_grade, a_exp, a_img, g_price FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS n, a_id, a_name, a_addr, a_grade, a_exp, a_img, g_price FROM ( SELECT a.a_id, a_name, a_addr, a_grade, a_exp, a_img, g_price FROM accomm a, guestroom g WHERE a.a_id = g.a_id AND g.g_id LIKE '%001' AND a.a_div = #{a_div} ORDER BY a_grade DESC ) a, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r ) b
